special_text:
[i](Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.)[/i]
When Free Market enters, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
You control a creature with power 4 or greater.
You control a creature with toughness 4 or greater.
rules_text2: Whenever you attack, double target attacking creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
flavor_text2: [i]Why waste resources establishing some line-in-the-sand equity when the market provides the answers free of charge?[/i]
